title: Diamond and Craig
description: https://www.podtrac.com/pts/redirect.mp3/archive.org/download/rr32020/CaseClosed720.mp3  This week's Case Closed begins with The Blind Man And The Cop Killer, from Richard Diamond, Private Detective. That story was originally aired February 26, 1950. (30:00) Our second story is A Very Odd Job, from Barrie Craig, Confidential Investigator, which was first heard January 30, 1952. content:encoded:
This week’s Case Closed begins with The Blind Man And The Cop Killer, from Richard Diamond, Private Detective. That story was originally aired February 26, 1950.

(30:00) Our second story is A Very Odd Job, from Barrie Craig, Confidential Investigator, which was first heard January 30, 1952.
